course_title: Special Topics: Political Science: Southern Politics
class_notes:
POLS 385 Special Topics: Southern Politics


his course will examine what makes the US South different from the rest of the nation. It will consider the distinctive political history of the South and how the legacy of that history still shapes both local and national politics today.
course_description: Selected topics and problems in political science. Content will vary in successive offerings of this course. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
sections: Class Nbr: 6002, Section #: 7, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: M. Gunning, Status: Open
